prodNameE: Spotchem I I Panel-2 Reagent Strip "Arkray"
ingredientsDesc:
Reactive Ingredients per 100 Reagent Strip:
1.LDH:Lithium L-lactate 9.3 mg
Nicotinamide adenine dinucleotide (NAD) 16.6 mg
Tetrazolium violet 6.9 mg
Diaphorase 107.0 mg
2.Albumin:Bromocresol green 2.0 mg
3.Total Protein:Copper sulfate 38.7 mg
4.Uric Acid:Uricase 28 unit
4-Aminoantipyrine 0.33 mg
N-Ethyl-N-(2-hydroxy-3-sulfopropyl)-m-toluidine sodium salt (TOOS) 0.88 mg
Peroxidase (POD) 262 unit
Ascorbate oxidase (AsOD) 455 unit
5.Calcium:o-Cresophthalein complexone (OCPC) 5.3 mg
6.Triglyceride:Lipoprotein lipase (LPL) 106 unit
Glycerol kinase 7.5 unit
Glycerol-3-phophate oxidase 32.0 unit
4-Aminoantipyrine 0.7 mg
N-Ethyl-N-(2-hydroxy-3-sulfopropyl)-3,5-dimethoxyaniline sodium salt (DAOS) 1.2 mg
Peroxidase (POD) 25.0 unit
Adenosine-5’-triphosphate, disodium salt (ATP) 6.0 mg
applicantName: 生展生物科技股份有限公司
applicantAddr: 台南市新營區開元路154號A棟
efficacy: 用在以血清或血漿做LDH, Albumin, Total Protein, Uric Acid, Calcium, 及Triglyceride 定量測定的試管診斷試藥，專用於SPOTCHEM儀器。
mdFormat:
50 strips。
新增規格：25 Strips。酌修仿單、標籤文字內容，核准內容詳如中文仿單核定本(原94年12月20日核定之仿單標籤核定本予以作廢)。

mdKind.mdKindMCodeName: A 臨床化學及臨床毒理學
